function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low ratio of urban green space per capita","Impact":"Increased risk of overcrowding and close contact in green spaces, leading to potential spread of contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Increase the availability of urban green spaces per capita, promote alternative outdoor recreation options.","Technologies":"Urban planning and design, GIS mapping for green space allocation.","People":"Residents and visitors of the districts with low green space ratios per capita.","Owner":"City planning authorities, local government, urban developers."},{"Description":"Decrease in visitors to green spaces during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Reduced outdoor leisure activities, potential increase in indoor gatherings, and higher risk of contagion in enclosed spaces.","Mitigation":"Promote safe outdoor activities, provide guidelines for using green spaces during a pandemic, enhance accessibility to green spaces.","Technologies":"Mobile applications for tracking park capacities, public health communication tools.","People":"Residents and visitors of urban areas affected by pandemic-related restrictions.","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities, park management organizations."},{"Description":"Governmental regulation banning the use of green spaces during the pandemic","Impact":"Limited access to outdoor recreation, increased psychological stress, and reduced physical activity.","Mitigation":"Develop alternative outdoor recreation areas, provide support for at-home physical activities, advocate for safe use of green spaces during pandemics.","Technologies":"Virtual fitness platforms, online wellness programs, remote mental health services.","People":"Residents affected by the regulations, including recreational and fitness enthusiasts.","Owner":"Local government, health authorities, fitness and wellness organizations."}]}
